name: Burg_16
culture_notes: Riveric Dialects dominant; Coastal Tongues understood
Tide-day ancestor rites shape business calendars
Diet: salted fish, fermented seaweed, river-grain porridges
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialist labor
Combustion industry limited; no high-pressure steam megatechs
notes: State affiliation unknown; functions as a minor logistics node
Population data unavailable; vulnerable to supply shocks
